title: Extraction of silica from sugarcane bagasse ash and its utilization in zeolite 4A synthesis for CO2 adsorption
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19472-19482
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02207F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Chalermpan Keawkumay, Panot Krukkratoke, Saran Youngjan, Nattawut Osakoo, Krittanun Deekamwong, Pongtanawat Khemthong, Jakkapop Phanthasri, Sanchai Prayoonpokarach, Jatuporn Wittayakun
This work explores silica (SiO2) extraction from sugarcane bagasse ash using NaOH solution. The obtained SiO2 with 98 wt% purity is further used to synthesize zeolite NaA for CO2 adsorption, showing comparable capacity to commercial NaA.
